definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field></block><block type="controls_if" x="90" y="126"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">EntityZombie</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">EntityCreeper</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Nice job! That's it for tonight, right click this to wake up.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SEDevice</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>
